boardTitle: The Best Video Game Soundtracks of All Time
boardContent: Video game soundtracks have come a long way . From epic orchestral scores to catchy chiptunes, video game music has become an art form in its own right. What are your favorite video game soundtracks? Let's share and discuss!

boardTitle: Asking for input until desired result, then returning result
boardContent: I'm currently building a Rock Paper Scissors game and trying to ask the user for their choice and then returning their choice. I'm using a while loop to continue to prompt the user for their choice until it is valid, but it continues to prompt even when I give it my desired answer.
